alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 09 at 3:24PM PDT until September 09 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Nye County in south central Nevada... * Until 515 PM PDT. * At 324 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Radar indicates that between 0.75 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Central Nye County FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
